name: Add new PomoDoneApp time entries to an Excel spreadsheet
description: Every time your PomoDoneApp timer stops, Make will automatically add the time entry as a new row on your Microsoft 365 Excel spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AnDK8KmbvjyFkDrZgjKkSI0rEUeK?e=tsm38S).
